jump_scares.spoiler: A hooded person wearing a mask drops down behind Tree
Tree turns around and the masked killer is standing in the doorway
The masked killer can now be seen in the mirror standing behind Tree
The television turns back on as Tree approaches the shower curtain
The masked killer appears from behind Tree
The lights in the hospital turn back on and Treeâ€™s professor (Gregory) is now standing beside Carter
Gregory opens a door, startling Tree as she tries to sneak down the hospital hallway, seconds later the masked killer appears behind Gregory
The police officer is suddenly hit by a car as he listens to his Walkie-talkie
